attributes.action: Encourage the EU to reduce the power limits for all Radio Amateurs to the UK level of 400 watts output.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
EU Radio Amateurs are allowed up to 1000 watts output, this causes extreme interference to others on the band.
The rest of the EU should therefore REDUCE their maximum power levels to 400 watts, which is the maximum allowed in the UK.
This would make contesting more equal  and cause less interference on the amateur bands in general.
It is possible to work the world on less than 5 watts so high power levels are unnecessary.
